scripts.build: node scripts/update-version.js && tsc -b && vite build && node scripts/update-version.js
scripts.build:deploy: node scripts/update-version.js && vite build && node scripts/update-version.js
scripts.deploy: npm run clear-cache && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:full: npm run clear-cache && npm run build && firebase deploy
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run deploy
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run deploy
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run deploy
